    • sendMessage

      public int sendMessage(int senderId, int receiverId, int relatedQuestionId, int relatedAnswerId, String content) throws SQLException
      Sends a message from one user to another
      Parameters:
      senderId - The ID of the sender
      receiverId - The ID of the receiver
      relatedQuestionId - The ID of the related question, or -1 if not related to a question
      relatedAnswerId - The ID of the related answer, or -1 if not related to an answer
      content - The message content
      Returns:
      The ID of the new message, or -1 if failed
      Throws:
      SQLException

      Parameters:
